cast.name: 赛吉尔·马雷洛 Sergio Malheiros

awards:
第50届卡罗维发利国际电影节(2015)
　　独立摄影机奖(提名)
introduction: For a Brazilian kid, Junior seems to have everything going for him — which is to say that he has a lot of football talent. So what if his girlfriend is pregnant, he's living with his alcoholic uncle, and he's got no money? Hope can be a terrifying thing when it is full of the unspeakable fear that it might lead to failure. Junior knows that football is a game for men, but how to be a man? Hopefuls recently won the Carte Blanche prize at the famous Karlovy Vary festival.
